uvi.description:
usb: dwc2: check return value after calling platform_get_resource()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.11 by commit 337f00a0bc62d7cb7d10ec0b872c79009a1641df. For more details please see the references link.
